arStrings.szText: Constructs and traps have breached the surface near {c_highlight}Vault{/c} entrances. Defeat them to earn loot and a special currency.
Constructs and traps have breached the surface near {c_highlight}Vault{/c} entrances. Defeat them to earn loot and a special currency.
Immolate {c_highlight}Cores{/c} at elemental {c_highlight}Braziers{/c} to summon {c_highlight}Heralds of Malphas{/c}: powerful elite Demons that drop {c_highlight}Pearls of Warding{/c}.
Immolate {c_highlight}Cores{/c} at elemental {c_highlight}Braziers{/c} to summon {c_highlight}Heralds of Malphas{/c}: powerful elite Demons that drop {c_highlight}Pearls of Warding{/c}.
{c_highlight}Pearls of Warding{/c} grant access to {c_highlight}Wardwoven Chests{/c} found within {c_highlight}Vaults{/c}.
{c_highlight}Pearls of Warding{/c} grant access to {c_highlight}Wardwoven Chests{/c} found within {c_highlight}Vaults{/c}.
